titles.title: My God, How Wonderful Thou Art

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: My God, how wonderful Thou art, Thy majesty how bright, How beautiful Thy mercy seat, in depths of burning light!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: How dread are Thine eternal years, O everlasting LORD; by prostrate spirits, day and night, incessantly adored.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: How wonderful, how beautiful, the sight of Thee must be, Thine endless wisdom, boundless pow'r, and awesome purity.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O how I fear Thee, Living God, with deepest, tend'rest fears, and worship Thee with trembling hope, and penitential tears.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Yet I may love Thee too, O LORD, Almighty as Thou art; for Thou hast stooped to ask of me the love of my poor heart.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: No earthly father loves like Thee, no mother eâ€™er so mild, bears and forbears, as Thou hast done with me, Thy sinful child.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Father of Jesus, love's reward, what rapture will it be, prostrate before Thy throne to lie, and ever gaze on Thee!
